title: How many people on OCE Server?
body: Just wondering how many players there are on the OCE server, if anyone knows please let me know, Thanks :)

replies.body: roughly 210,000 people who are ranked this season. I got this number by looking at the server rank of a player who was in bronze 5 (0 LP) and his rank was 208,000
:) I have a bronze v account currently sitting at -39 lp
You my friend, are my idol

not enough

also we have a high smurf population going for us too
